title: Enhancing Teaching Methodology Practical Competencies: Utilizing E-Learning Design Support Systems for Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can construct a mobile-friendly microlearning design framework using knowledge-based architecture
Learners can operate a language learning content search and classification system by applying metadata management tools
Learners can design a process to improve personalized microlearning content by analyzing formative assessment results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
